Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner "
# I18n ãƒ¢ã‚¸ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã®ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚¨ã‚¤ãƒªã‚¢ã‚¹ã‚’ç¢ºèª
puts ''=== I18n module methods ===''
puts ""I18n.respond_to?(:t): #{I18n.respond_to?(:t)}""
puts ""I18n.respond_to?(:translate): #{I18n.respond_to?(:translate)}""
puts ""I18n.respond_to?(:l): #{I18n.respond_to?(:l)}""
puts ""I18n.respond_to?(:localize): #{I18n.respond_to?(:localize)}""
puts ''''
puts ''=== Test I18n.t vs I18n.l ===''
begin
  puts ""I18n.t(:field_login): #{I18n.t(:field_login)}""
rescue => e
  puts ""I18n.t(:field_login) ERROR: #{e.message}""
end

begin
  puts ""I18n.l(:field_login): #{I18n.l(:field_login)}""
rescue => e
  puts ""I18n.l(:field_login) ERROR: #{e.class.name}: #{e.message}""
end
")

Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails runner "
# ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã—ã¦ã¿ã‚‹
require ''action_view''
require ''action_controller''

class TestController < ApplicationController
  def test_render
    render inline: ''<%= l(:field_login) %>'', layout: false
  end
end

controller = TestController.new
controller.request = ActionController::TestRequest.create
controller.response = ActionController::TestResponse.new

begin
  controller.process(:test_render)
  puts ''=== Rendering Success ===''
  puts controller.response.body
rescue => e
  puts ''=== Rendering ERROR ===''
  puts ""#{e.class.name}: #{e.message}""
  puts e.backtrace.first(5).join(""\n"")
end
")
